body_html:
Hi, I have the same problem with loading trained model on GPU host and loaded on CPU host (both linux Ubuntu 14.04 LTS). There is example:
on GPU - Model accuracy: 0.79
on CPU - Model accuracy: 0.16
The code and model definition is same in Python.
Unfortunately on both machines Indigo package not installed... and model loads on both host without errors.
